metadata.title: USN-3941-1 -- Lua vulnerability
metadata.description: Fady Othman discovered that Lua incorrectly handled certain scripts. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3941-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  lua5.3 - 5.3.1-1ubuntu2.1 liblua5.3-dev - 5.3.1-1ubuntu2.1 liblua5.3-0 - 5.3.1-1ubuntu2.1 No subscription required
